markdownRemark.html: Uncle spufus uses macchanger however it checks that the MAC is successfully spoofed after connecting to a network. It will always fail if a MAC reverts back to the original after connecting to a network. It tries some well known techniques to spoof your MAC. When it finds the one thats working it saves that technique for future use.

frontmatter.title: Uncle Spufus
frontmatter.description: A tool for automating MAC Address Spoofing
